title: Complete project proposal
description: Write and finalize the project proposal document

title: Prepare presentation slides
description: Create slides for the upcoming meeting

title: Review code changes
description: Review and provide feedback on recent code changes

title: Attend team meeting
description: Participate in the weekly team meeting

title: Update project documentation
description: Make necessary updates to project documentation

title: Test new feature
description: Perform testing on the newly implemented feature

title: Code refactoring
description: Refactor existing codebase for better maintainability

title: Bug fixes
description: Address and fix reported bugs in the application

title: Implement new feature
description: Start implementation of a new feature based on requirements

title: Code review
description: Conduct code review session for peer's code changes
